Description: Zaibas
Effect: Lv. 1 Attack Ratio: #{SkillFactor}#, AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#
EffectSkillFactor: ["    local sklFactor;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        local atkType = skill.AttackType;", "        local attribute = skill.Attribute;", "        local atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "        local attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    else", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    end", "end"]
EffectSkillSR: ["    local value = pc.SR + skill.SklSR;", "    if value < 1 then", "        value = 1", "    end", "    return value", "end"]

Description: In development
EffectSkillFactor: ["    local sklFactor;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        local atkType = skill.AttackType;", "        local attribute = skill.Attribute;", "        local atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "        local attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    else", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    end", "end"]
EffectSkillSR: ["    local value = pc.SR + skill.SklSR;", "    if value < 1 then", "        value = 1", "    end", "    return value", "end"]
EffectSpendSP: ["    local basicsp = skill.BasicSP;", "    local lv = skill.Level;", "    local lvUpSpendSp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "    local decsp = 0;", "    if basicsp == 0 then", "        return 0;", "    end", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "    local lvUpSpendSpRound = math.floor((lvUpSpendSp * 10000) + 0.5)/10000;", "--  value = basicsp + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound + abilAddSP;", "    local value = basicsp + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSpRound;", "    value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "    local zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "    if zeminaLv > 0 then", "        decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "    end", "    value = value - decsp;", "    if IsBuffApplied(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\") == \"YES\" then", "        if TryGetProp(skill, \"EnableCompanion\") == \"YES\" then", "            local acrobaticBuff = GetBuffByName(pc, \"AcrobaticMount_Buff\")", "            local acrobaticBuffLevel = GetBuffArg(acrobaticBuff)", "            local acrobaticAddSPRate = acrobaticBuffLevel * 0.1", "            value = value *(1 + acrobaticAddSPRate)", "            SetExProp(acrobaticBuff, \"ACROBATICMOUNT_SPENDSP\", math.floor(value))", "        end", "    end", "    if value < 1 then", "        value = 1;", "    end", "    return math.floor(value);", "end"]
Name: Hoplite

EffectSkillSR: ["    if abil ~= nil and skill.ClassName == \"Swordman_Bash\" and 1 == abil.ActiveState then", "      return pc.SR + skill.SklSR + abil.Level;", "    end", "    return pc.SR + skill.SklSR", "end"]
Name: Bash

Description: Become determined by temporarily increasing your attack, while decreasing your defense.
EffectCaptionRatio: ["    local value = 10 + ((skill.Level - 1) * 2) + ((skill.Level / 5) * ((pc.STR * 0.5) ^ 0.8))", "    if Swordman13_abil ~= nil and skill.Level >= 3 then", "        value = value * (1 + Swordman13_abil.Level * 0.01);", "    end", "    return math.floor(value);", "end"]
EffectCaptionRatio2: ["    local value = 5 + (skill.Level - 1) + ((skill.Level / 5) * ((pc.STR * 0.3) ^ 0.5))", "--    if Swordman21_abil ~= nil then", "--        value = value * 1.44", "--    elseif Swordman21_abil == nil and Swordman20_abil ~= nil then", "--        value = value * 1.38", "--    end", "    if Swordman13_abil ~= nil and skill.Level >= 3 then", "        value = value * (1 + Swordman13_abil.Level * 0.01);", "    end", "    return math.floor(value);", "end"]

EffectSkillFactor: ["    local sklFactor;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        local atkType = skill.AttackType;", "        local attribute = skill.Attribute;", "        local atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "        local attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    else", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    end", "end"]
Name: Giant Swing

EffectSkillFactor: ["    local sklFactor;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        local atkType = skill.AttackType;", "        local attribute = skill.Attribute;", "        local atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "        local attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    else", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    end", "end"]

Description: Leave behind an apparition on your location and you get teleported randomly to a different place. The apparition remains for a period of time and receives damage from the monsters in your stead.
Name: Blink

Description: Locks the enemies in the selected location up in a different dimension. The locked enemies will not be able get attacked by receives continous damage while in the state and once unlocked, get sileneced.
EffectSkillAtkAdd: ["    local sklAtkAdd;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        sklAtkAdd = skill.SklAtkAdd + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklAtkAddByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklAtkAdd);", "    else", "        return 0;", "    end", "end"]
Name: Maze

Description: Decreases damage received from missile attacks and magic projectile attacks for you and your party members. Reduces each attack received by 3 hits.
EffectCaptionTime: ["    local value = 60;", "    if IsPVPServerplayer == 1 then", "        value = value / 3", "    end", "    return math.floor(value)", "end"]
Name: Missile Hole

Effect: Up to 3 saved locations may be used

When the hole dissipates, enemies within range receive damage, with those that disappeared receiving additional damage.

Description: Grants the main weapon of nearby allies with the [Enchantment] buff. The effects of [Enchantment] is likely to make the targets in a confused state.
Name: Enchantment

Description: Grants the main weapon and top armor of nearby allies briefly with the [Reward] buff. The effects of [Reward] increases a weapon's attack and top armor's defense.
Name: Reward

Description: Temporarily enchants the shoes of nearby allies with the [Agility] buff. The effects of [Agility] increases maximum Stamina and increases the chance to dodge an enemy attack proportional to your current Stamina.
Name: Agility

Description: Sets up a shop that grants armor equipment with enchantments.
Effect: The number of available enchantments increases with skill level{nl}Maximum Level: 5
Name: Enchant Armor

Description: Craft a spellbook containing a selected skill that can be used by anyone.
Effect: The spellbook disappears after it's used
Name: Craft Spellbook

Description: Grants a Lightning property damage buff to you and your party members. Changes melee and missile attacks to Lightning property. Additional Lightning property damage increases in proportion to the caster's INT and SPR.
Effect: Lightning Property Additional Damage +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Consumes #{SpendItemCount}# Enchant Round
EffectCaptionRatio: ["--    local value = 100 * skill.Level", "    local value = 160 + ((skill.Level - 1) * 60) + ((skill.Level / 5) * (((pc.INT + pc.MNA) * 0.8) ^ 0.9))", "    return math.floor(value)", "end"]
Name: Enchant Lightning

Description: Briefly increases your and your party members' characer levels and max SP. The increased level will not be explicitly shown but when entering instances, it will prove very useful.
Name: Empowering

Description: Enchant the armor of you and your party with the power of the land, granting the ability to block without having to wear shields.
Name: Enchant Earth

Description: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Lightning]{/}{/}{nl}Change your basic attack to a Lightning property ranged attack.
EffectSkillFactor: ["    local sklFactor;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        local atkType = skill.AttackType;", "        local attribute = skill.Attribute;", "        local atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "        local attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    else", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    end", "end"]
Name: Lightning Hands

Description: Increases the enhancement values of main weapons equipped by you and nearby allies by a value equal to skill level.

Description: Decreases the cooldown on all current skills.
EffectSpendSP: ["    local basicsp = skill.BasicSP;", "    local lv = skill.Level;", "    local addsp = skill.LvUpSpendSp;", "    local decsp = 0;", "    if basicsp == 0 then", "        return 0;", "    end", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "--  local value = basicsp + (lv - 1) * addsp + abilAddSP;", "    local value = basicsp + (lv - 1) * addsp", "    if GHabil ~= nil then ", "        value = value + (value * (GHabil.Level * 0.1))", "    end", "    value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "    local zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "    if zeminaLv > 0 then", "        decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "    end", "    value = value - decsp;", "    if value < 1 then", "        value = 1;", "    end", "    return math.floor(value);", "end"]
Name: Be Prepared

EffectSkillFactor: ["    local sklFactor;", "    if skillOwner.ClassName == 'PC' then", "        local atkType = skill.AttackType;", "        local attribute = skill.Attribute;", "        local atkTypebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, atkType);", "        local attributebyItem = GetSumOfEquipItem(skillOwner, attribute);", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel + atkTypebyItem + attributebyItem;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    else", "        sklFactor = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "        return math.floor(sklFactor);", "    end", "end"]

Continuously consumes SP, and the effect cancels if low on SP.

EffectCaptionRatio: ["    local basicsp = 40;", "    local lv = skill.Level;", "    local lvUpSpendSp = 4;", "    local decsp = 0;", "    if basicsp == 0 then", "        return 0;", "    end", "    abilAddSP = abilAddSP / 100;", "--  local value = basicsp + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp + abilAddSP;", "    local value = basicsp + (lv - 1) * lvUpSpendSp;", "    if IsBuffApplied(pc, 'Wizard_Wild_buff') == 'YES' then", "        value = value * 1.5 * spRatio;", "        return math.floor(value);", "    end", "    if IsBuffApplied(pc, 'MalleusMaleficarum_Debuff') == 'YES' then", "        value = value * 2", "        return math.floor(value);", "    end    ", "    value = value + (value * abilAddSP);", "    local zeminaLv = GetExProp(pc, \"ZEMINA_BUFF_LV\");", "    if zeminaLv > 0 then", "        decsp = 4 + (zeminaLv * 4);", "    end", "    value = value - decsp;", "    if value < 1 then", "        value = 1;", "    end", "    return math.floor(value);", "end"]
EffectSkillFactor: ["    local value = skill.SklFactor + (skill.Level - 1) * skill.SklFactorByLevel;", "    if abil ~= nil then", "        value = SCR_ABIL_ADD_SKILLFACTOR(abil, value);", "    end", "    return math.floor(value)", "end"]
